name: Chameleon.exe
description:
Use the last antivirus program to take back your infected machine!

WASD to move, space to fire.

Fire delete commands at infected programs to free up System Memory (Score).
But watch out!  They are firing full memory chunks at your program to stop it.  Once Your Memory (health) runs out, the program will crash and the system is doomed!

The infection originated from a security loophole in a very old program.  Find that ancient program and purge it from your system.

For a perfect score, complete the game without taking any damage.

Disclaimer: This was my first Unity project, there miiight be an error hidden in there.  Somewhere.  Very well-hidden, you probably won't notice it in-game.
